General.Name: Grid Battery Metals Inc.
General.Description: Grid Battery Metals Inc. acquires, explores for, and develops brine-based lithium and mineral resource properties in Canada and the United States. It holds interest in the Clayton Valley project covering an area of 2,300 acres in Nevada. The company was formerly known as Nickel Rock Resources Inc. and changed its name to Grid Battery Metals Inc. in April 2023. Grid Battery Metals Inc. was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Coquitlam, Canada.
